sponsor: Naurex, Inc, an affiliate of Allergan plc
briefTitle: A Study of Rapastinel as Adjunctive Therapy in Major Depressive Disorder (RAP-MD-01)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Study of Rapastinel as Adjunctive Therapy in Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of rapastinel 450 mg compared to placebo adjunctive to antidepressant therapy (ADT) in patients with major depressive disorder (MDD) who have a partial response to ADT.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) Total Score at the End of Trial
